name: twelvety-website-service
description: API-driven website-as-a-service powered by Eleventy with validation and build orchestration

scripts.prebuild: npm run bundle:ajv && npm run bundle:lunr
scripts.dev: npm run bundle:ajv && npm run bundle:lunr && eleventy --serve
scripts.build: npm run bundle:ajv && npm run bundle:lunr && eleventy && npm run search-index
scripts.build:gh: npm run bundle:ajv && npm run bundle:lunr && cross-env ELEVENTY_PATH_PREFIX=/twelvety eleventy && npm run search-index

author: Twelvety Team
